casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Michael Lee DUFF. No. 407P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 9, 2005. Anne Bleyman, for Michael Lee Duff. Ronald L. Moore, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 4th day of August 2005 by Attorney General for Temporary Stay:

*737"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 9th day of August 2005."
